mapper.select: select id, name, email,company, contact, auth from member order by id asc
mapper.insert: insert into member(id,name, company, pwd, email, contact, auth) values(#{id},#{name}, #{company}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{contact},0)
mapper.select: select id, name, email from member where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd} and auth=0
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name} where id=#{id}
update member set email=#{email} where id=#{id}
update member set contact=#{contact} where id=#{id}
